Package com.fluidops.iwb.monitoring

Monitoring of backend status and sessions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MonitoringUtil.DatabaseLogExportMBean MBean for JMX export
 

Class Summary
MonitoringHttpSessionListener Session listener that can be registered to the web application in order to monitor HTTP sessions (i.e. number of users, users that are currently logged in) Code to register the listener in the web.xml com.fluidops.iwb.monitoring.MonitoringHttpSessionListener
MonitoringResultHolder Class to maintain monitoring information such as the number of active sessions.
MonitoringResultHolder.DatabaseLog  
MonitoringUtil Convenience functions for monitoring, functionality to enable JMX.
MonitoringUtil.DatabaseLogExport Implementation of the DatabaseLog MBean for JMX export
ReadMonitorRepositoryConnection RepositoryConnection delegate to monitor any read operation on the database
StatusServlet Servlet to show the status of the Information Workbench (e.g. databases etc) In case of any error HTTP 500 is returned.
SystemStateInfo Structure to maintain system state information of a particular SystemStateFeature.
 

Enum Summary
MonitoringResultHolder.DatabaseType  
SystemStateFeature Enum for all features that can be accessed from system state.
SystemStateInfo.State  
 

Package com.fluidops.iwb.monitoring Description

Monitoring of backend status and sessions.
